'''"Tailored Courier Service"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tailored Courier Service" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] northwest of [[Tepeacac Rise]], near a teleporter.
<gallery>
Item "Tailored Courier Service" Location.png|Map location
Item "Tailored Courier Service" Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
